content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reporting Violations\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All EPAM employees are responsible to know, understand and follow EPAM's Code of Conduct as well as other policies and procedures adopted in EPAM. Violations lead to disciplinary actions up to termination of relationship with an employee. Please let EPAM know if you become aware of conduct that violates this Code. Failure to do so may be subject to disciplinary actions as well. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM will investigate any violation reports and treat them confidentially to the extent possible. EPAM does not permit any retaliation against those who report violations and will take disciplinary actions against any employees participating in retaliation. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please thoroughly read the abstract from EPAM Code of Conduct below:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"INTRODUCTION\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who Must Follow It?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  All employees, officers and Board members are expected to know and follow this Code.  EPAM also expects all contractors, suppliers and other business partners to follow this Code when working for or with us.  Failure to follow this Code can result in disciplinary action or termination of the relationship. Disciplinary action may also be taken against managers or officers who condone, permit or fail to take appropriate preventative, corrective or other action against illegal, unethical or other improper conduct.  If you become aware of conduct that you think violates this Code, or that is or may be harmful to EPAM, you should let EPAM know.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Who Can Help Me With Questions or Reporting Concerns? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You have several options for “Asking Code of Conduct Questions” or “Reporting Code of Conduct a Code of Conduct concern\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".  For example, when sending an email please include the text “Asking a Code of Conduct Question” or “Reporting a Code of Conduct Concern” in the Subject Line or in the first text line of your email.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM will protect your confidentiality to the extent it reasonably can, consistent with the relevant laws and EPAM's need to investigate.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What Happens If I Ask a Question or Report A Code of Conduct Concern?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you ask a question, you will get an answer.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you report a concern, EPAM will promptly review your concern and will take appropriate investigative, corrective and/or disciplinary action where needed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM does not permit any retaliation against you because of your good faith question or report of any known, suspected or potential Code of Conduct violation, or because you cooperate in good faith in any investigation.  Any person who participates in retaliation is subject to disciplinary action, including termination.  If you think you are being retaliated against because of your question or concern or for cooperating in a related investigation, contact the Chief Compliance Officer or EPAM's Hotline.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Where Can I Find a Copy of the
